description: Implement Linear integration into the ACGS2 integration-service to enable bidirectional synchronization between Linear issues and external tools (GitHub, GitLab, Slack). This will make Linear the source of truth for product development workflows by automatically syncing issue states, comments, and metadata across platforms.

phases.description: Verify packages, set up dependencies, configuration, and Linear GraphQL client

subtasks.description: Verify all package names and versions on PyPI (gql, PyGithub, python-gitlab, slack-sdk)
subtasks.notes: ✅ All packages verified on PyPI: gql 4.0.0 (req: >=3.5.0), PyGithub 2.8.1 (req: >=2.1.0), python-gitlab 7.1.0 (req: >=4.4.0), slack-sdk 3.39.0 (req: >=3.33.0). The gql[all] extra is confirmed available. Verification report created at pypi-package-verification.md.

subtasks.description: Verify Linear GraphQL API documentation and authentication methods
subtasks.notes: ✅ Linear API verification report created at linear-api-verification.md. Documented GraphQL endpoint (https://api.linear.app/graphql), Bearer token authentication, HMAC-SHA256 webhook signatures, rate limiting, and pagination patterns. Manual verification checklist provided for: endpoint URL, auth headers, rate limit thresholds, webhook event types, signature verification method, and GraphQL schema. Report includes security considerations and next steps.

subtasks.description: Verify GitHub, GitLab, and Slack API documentation
subtasks.notes: ✅ GitHub, GitLab, and Slack API verification report created at github-gitlab-slack-api-verification.md. Documented authentication methods (GitHub: Bearer token, GitLab: PRIVATE-TOKEN, Slack: Bot token), rate limiting patterns (GitHub: 5000/hr, GitLab: 300/min, Slack: tiered), webhook signature verification (GitHub: HMAC-SHA256, GitLab: simple token, Slack: HMAC-SHA256 with timestamp), and API patterns for PyGithub, python-gitlab, and slack-sdk libraries. Manual verification checklist provided for: endpoint URLs, auth headers, rate limits, webhook structures, and async support in libraries. Report includes security considerations and integration patterns.

subtasks.description: Add Linear dependencies to requirements.txt
subtasks.notes: ✅ Added Linear dependencies to requirements.txt: gql[all]>=3.5.0 (GraphQL client), PyGithub>=2.1.0 (GitHub API), python-gitlab>=4.4.0 (GitLab API), slack-sdk>=3.33.0 (Slack SDK). Pre-commit hook automatically sorted the dependencies alphabetically. All packages verified in subtask 1.1 are now included in requirements.txt.

subtasks.description: Update .env.example with Linear environment variables
subtasks.notes: ✅ Added Linear integration environment variables (LINEAR_API_KEY, LINEAR_WEBHOOK_SECRET, LINEAR_TEAM_ID, LINEAR_PROJECT_ID) and Slack integration variables (SLACK_BOT_TOKEN, SLACK_SIGNING_SECRET, SLACK_DEFAULT_CHANNEL) to integration-service/.env.example. Included setup instructions following existing patterns from JIRA and ServiceNow integrations. Committed with proper git message.

subtasks.description: Create Linear configuration class using pydantic-settings
subtasks.notes: ✅ Created Linear configuration class using pydantic-settings at integration-service/src/config.py. Implemented LinearConfig, SlackConfig, and IntegrationServiceConfig classes with proper SecretStr for sensitive fields (LINEAR_API_KEY, LINEAR_WEBHOOK_SECRET, SLACK_BOT_TOKEN, SLACK_SIGNING_SECRET). Added singleton pattern with get_linear_config(), get_slack_config(), and get_service_config() helper functions. All fields properly typed with validation and default values. Committed successfully with all pre-commit hooks passing.

subtasks.description: Implement Linear GraphQL client with async support
subtasks.notes: ✅ Implemented Linear GraphQL client at integration-service/src/integrations/linear/client.py. Created LinearClient class with async support using gql library and AIOHTTPTransport. Implemented all required methods: create_issue, get_issue, update_issue, list_issues, add_comment. Added comprehensive error handling with custom exception classes (LinearClientError, LinearAuthenticationError, LinearRateLimitError, LinearNotFoundError, LinearValidationError). Integrated retry logic with exponential backoff using tenacity. Supports pagination for large result sets. Rate limiting detection and handling. Async context manager support (__aenter__/__aexit__). All pre-commit hooks passed. Committed with hash 2476c97b9.

subtasks.description: Write unit tests for Linear GraphQL client
subtasks.notes: ✅ Comprehensive test suite created for Linear GraphQL client at tests/integrations/test_linear_client.py. Includes 839 lines with 49 test functions covering: initialization, query execution, issue CRUD operations, comment creation, pagination, error handling (auth, rate limits, not found, validation), retry logic, and async context manager support. All tests follow existing patterns from test_jira.py. Committed with hash 45840bf5a.

phases.description: Implement Linear webhook endpoint, signature verification, and Redis state tracking

subtasks.description: Create Pydantic models for Linear webhook payloads
subtasks.notes: Starting implementation of Pydantic models for Linear webhook payloads. Reviewing existing patterns from integration-service/src/webhooks/models.py and integration-service/src/config/models.py

subtasks.description: Implement webhook signature verification middleware
subtasks.notes: Create src/integrations/linear/webhook_auth.py. Implement HMAC-SHA256 signature verification using LINEAR_WEBHOOK_SECRET. Follow existing webhook security patterns.

subtasks.description: Create Linear webhook endpoint handler
subtasks.notes: Create src/api/linear_webhooks.py. Implement POST /webhooks/linear endpoint. Verify signature, parse payload, return 200 OK within 3 seconds, queue processing.

subtasks.description: Set up Redis state tracking for sync operations
subtasks.notes: Create src/integrations/linear/state.py. Implement Redis-backed state tracking: last_synced_at, sync_source, event_id for deduplication. Use existing Redis client.

subtasks.description: Write unit tests for webhook handler and signature verification
subtasks.notes: Create tests/api/test_linear_webhooks.py. Test: valid signature acceptance, invalid signature rejection, payload parsing, malformed payload handling.

phases.description: Implement bidirectional sync between Linear and GitHub/GitLab with deduplication and conflict resolution

subtasks.description: Implement deduplication logic with Redis
subtasks.notes: Create src/integrations/linear/deduplication.py. Track event IDs in Redis, check before processing. Prevent infinite sync loops using event source tracking.

subtasks.description: Implement conflict resolution (last-write-wins) logic
subtasks.notes: Create src/integrations/linear/conflict_resolution.py. Use timestamp tracking in Redis. Implement last-write-wins strategy with proper logging.

subtasks.description: Build GitHub sync manager for Linear ↔ GitHub bidirectional sync
subtasks.notes: Create src/integrations/linear/github_sync.py. Use PyGithub library. Implement: issue creation sync, status sync, comment sync, PR status to Linear. Handle rate limiting with tenacity.

subtasks.description: Build GitLab sync manager for Linear ↔ GitLab bidirectional sync
subtasks.notes: Create src/integrations/linear/gitlab_sync.py. Use python-gitlab library. Implement: issue creation sync, status sync, comment sync, MR status to Linear. Handle rate limiting.

subtasks.description: Write unit tests for GitHub sync manager
subtasks.notes: Create tests/sync/test_github_linear_sync.py. Mock GitHub API. Test: issue creation, status updates, comment sync, deduplication, error handling.

subtasks.description: Write unit tests for GitLab sync manager
subtasks.notes: Create tests/sync/test_gitlab_linear_sync.py. Mock GitLab API. Test: issue creation, status updates, comment sync, deduplication, error handling.

phases.description: Implement Slack notifications for Linear issue updates

subtasks.description: Create Slack notification service using slack-sdk
subtasks.notes: Create src/integrations/linear/slack_notifier.py. Use slack-sdk WebClient. Implement: post_issue_created, post_status_changed with async support.

subtasks.description: Create Slack message templates using Block Kit
subtasks.notes: Create src/integrations/linear/slack_templates.py. Design Block Kit templates for: issue created, status changed, comment added. Include issue title, description, assignee, status, link.

subtasks.description: Wire Slack notifier into sync engine
subtasks.notes: Update webhook handler and sync managers to trigger Slack notifications. Handle graceful degradation if SLACK_BOT_TOKEN not configured.

subtasks.description: Write unit tests for Slack notifier
subtasks.notes: Create tests/notifications/test_slack.py. Mock Slack WebClient. Test: message formatting, Block Kit structure, error handling, missing credentials.

subtasks.notes: Create tests/integration/test_linear_github_integration.py. Test full flow: Linear webhook → GitHub issue creation → GitHub update → Linear update. Verify no infinite loops.

subtasks.description: Write integration tests for Linear → GitLab sync flow
subtasks.notes: Create tests/integration/test_linear_gitlab_integration.py. Test full flow: Linear webhook → GitLab issue creation → GitLab update → Linear update. Verify deduplication.

subtasks.description: Write integration test for Linear → Slack notification flow
subtasks.notes: Create tests/integration/test_linear_slack_integration.py. Test: Linear webhook triggers Slack notification with correct formatting.

subtasks.description: Write end-to-end test for complete sync flow
subtasks.notes: Create tests/e2e/test_linear_integration.py. Test complete flow: Linear issue → GitHub + GitLab + Slack. Verify all services receive correct updates.

subtasks.description: Write tests for deduplication logic
subtasks.notes: Create tests/sync/test_deduplication.py. Test: duplicate event filtering, Redis state tracking, event source tracking to prevent loops.

subtasks.description: Write tests for conflict resolution

subtasks.notes: Run pytest with coverage. Ensure ≥80% coverage. Verify no regressions in JIRA/ServiceNow integrations. Fix any failing tests.

subtasks.notes: Ensure all Linear endpoints are documented with proper OpenAPI schemas. Test http://localhost:8000/docs shows Linear webhook and sync endpoints.

subtasks.notes: Create .auto-claude/specs/001-connect-your-tools/init.sh. Script to: install dependencies, set up Redis, verify environment variables, run initial tests.
